meanings.definition: The quality or state of being plush.
meanings.sent1: The plushness of the sofa made it very comfortable to sit on.
meanings.sent2: The plushness of the carpet made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent3: The plushness of the teddy bear made it the envy of all other toys.
meanings.sent4: The plushness of the velvet curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The plushness of the pillow was like resting your head on a cloud.

meanings.definition: A plush or luxurious quality or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The plushness of the robe made her feel like royalty.
meanings.sent2: The plushness of the hotel room made their vacation extra special.
meanings.sent3: The plushness of the blanket made it hard to get out of bed in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The plushness of the fur coat made heads turn wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The plushness of the velvet dress shimmered under the lights.
